thread.section_title: Beachcamera Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Beachcamera | www.beachcamera.com | 6 of 12
thread.title: Christina Dyches

author: Christina Dyches
title: Christina Dyches
text: I ordered the same item from another website 7 days before Xmas and paid for 3 day delivery. They never sent it and had a hold on my money. The day I finally talked to someone and cancelled my order. My money was released and I ordered from beachcamera the item was cheaper and it arrived as promised. Thankfully my gift was for a 15 yr old that understood but loves his system. Thank you
